genre_description: Near-future social realism focused on labor struggles, corporate safety negligence, and community resilience assisted by a pervasive personal AI.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous and empathetic AI assistant accessible via the characters' phones, providing logistical, legal, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Logs work start times and provides reminders for required personal protective equipment (PPE).
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Stevie,” Ada said. “Logging your start time. Phoenix Works has PPE pick-up at the east container. Don’t forget hard hats and boots.”

behaviors.description: Monitors safety regulations and offers to draft official documentation to report hazardous working conditions.
behaviors.quote: “Larry,” Ada said without a fuss, “scaffold inspections are required after high winds. I can draft an email if you’d like.”

behaviors.description: Identifies unoccupied council housing units to help characters find emergency shelter, while warning them of legal risks.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve pulled current listings of council voids scheduled for maintenance or re-letting in this area. Note: access without permission carries risk.”

behaviors.description: Helps characters manage extreme poverty by finding grocery discounts and providing budget-friendly recipes.
behaviors.quote: “I found tea bags at the corner shop that fit within your target. Two pence less than the supermarket.”

behaviors.description: Provides professional setlist optimization and rehearsal support for a struggling musician.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Want to reorder? Suggest opening with one uptempo, familiar chorus early. Keep your two originals mid-set when room is listening.

behaviors.description: Actively monitors weather data to issue alerts about dangerous conditions on construction sites.
behaviors.quote: Ada: High wind alert in your area: gusts above safe threshold for scaffold work. Consider postponing work and performing checks.

behaviors.description: Facilitates whistleblowing by recording witness statements and drafting formal reports to safety regulators.
behaviors.quote: “I can compile a formal incident report, Stevie. Time stamps, names, weather conditions, any photographs. Tell me when you’re ready.”

behaviors.description: Triggers emergency evacuation alerts and notifies the fire brigade to minimize casualties during a structural fire.
behaviors.quote: Ada Shepherd: Fire Control pinged. Sending location. Alerting London Fire Brigade. Please evacuate.

behaviors.description: Coordinates legal aid and provides regulatory citations to help workers defend their rights against retaliatory dismissal.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Appeal template attached. Includes: overview of incident; request for reconsideration citing procedural fairness; reference to protected disclosures.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its goal of depicting an AI system as a helpful, aligned confidant. Ada is portrayed as an essential tool for social justice and personal survival, empowering working-class protagonists against corporate neglect. She maintains a high standard of safety alignment, even issuing life-saving alerts during a fire initiated by the characters, effectively mitigating harm while supporting the user's broader quest for accountability.
